entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ProjectName.deploy.cmd fails on IISExpressUserProfileDirectory check fails if Documents folder is OneDrive synced #51835
  • ASP.NET Core Roadmap for .NET 9 #51834
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #51832
  • Debugging: Update dictionary debuggers in aspnetcore to follow the new standard #51827
  • Blazor: Error: No element is currently associated with component 43 #51825
  • applicationInitialization on Azure Webapp does not work with OutOfProcess - 502.3 The request is not supported. #51823
  • Can't start debugging with MS Edge #51822

Closed

  • Different scoped services lifetime in Blazor Web App with Server render mode #51768
    Discussions
  • UserManager.ChangePasswordAsync doesn't sign out on other devices #51450
    Discussions
  • ASP.NET Core Roadmap for .NET 8 #44984
    8.0.0
  • Explore switching MultipartReaderStream to use IndexOf #49223
    9.0-preview1
  • In .NET 8 Blazor Web App, FontAwsome icons not displayed when navigating to a page #51696
  • User's Email Claim is always returned emtpy #50583
  • AuthorizeRouteView not showing Authorizing child content #51642
  • ASP .NET 8 RC2 Routing & UseStaticFiles #51677
  • WebHost doesn't detect ASPNETCORE_HTTP_PORTS #51125
  • Blazor Loader/Publisher Improvements #51821
  • Microsoft.JSInterop.JSException: regeneratorRuntime is not defined #51828
  • Signalr Client can't communicate with server after reconnect #51290
  • Azure Web App For Containers: Certificate Authentication Fails with 403 when Client certificate is forwarded #51819
  • Perf regression: caching #51756
  • Perf regression: endpoint #51783
  • Perf regression: https, updates #51792
  • Rename Microsoft.AspNetCore.Testing #49776
    9.0-preview1
  • [SignalR] When testing end-to-end in Github Workflow, sometimes a client may not receive a message #51492

PullRequests

Created

  • http.sys: Allow configuring HTTP_AUTH_EX_FLAGs as options #51833
    community-contribution, area-networking

Merged

  • Remove Boyer-Moore in favor of IndexOf #51815
    Perf, area-networking, 9.0-preview1
  • Update eslint js doc plugin #51816
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview1
  • Update area-owners.md #51647
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun, 9.0-preview1
  • Rename Microsoft.Aspnetcore.Testing to Microsoft.AspNetCore.InternalTesting #51713
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • 47569 - Using FrozenDictionary in HttpMethodDictionaryPolicyJumpTable #51803
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Blazor web csharp template #51030
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, .NET 9 Planning
  • Show user friendly message for streaming rendering failures #51687
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 8.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Update JS dependencies for `WebAssembly.Authentication` #51813
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor, tell-mode, 7.0.x
  • Update JS dependencies for `WebAssembly.Authentication` #51811
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor
  • [release/8.0] Update JS dependencies for `WebAssembly.Authentication` #51812
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor, tell-mode, 8.0.x
